Name: ルナティックドーン レジェンドパック
About the game: ARTDINK 'Legend Pack' Series The ARTDINK 'Legend Pack' Series is a compilation of ARTDINK's masterpiece works of the 1980s and 1990s. The PC9800 versions of these games can finally be played in Windows. In addition, a Library Mode exclusive to the 'Legend Pack' allows you to browse illustrations, graphic and sound data. 'Lunatic Dawn Legend Pack' is a compilation containing the following titles: 'Lunatic Dawn' (original release 1993) 'Lunatic Dawn II' (original release 1994) 'Lunatic Dawn III' (original release 1998) Lunatic Dawn are non-linear RPG games set in Medieval Eurasia inspired world. This game is only available in Japanese.
